title: Bio-Tech Grand Piano — Edition #1/10
description: First edition of the Bio-Tech Grand Piano concept print. Glass body revealing titanium skeletal frame, bioluminescent neural network strings that glow cyan. Limited to 10 numbered prints.

item.details: High-resolution digital print (4096x2304) with certificate of authenticity. Generated with Gemini 3 Pro via Nano Banana MCP. Edition 1 of 10.

title: Bio-Tech Violin Blueprint — Edition #1/10
description: Technical exploded-view blueprint of a bio-tech violin. Carbon-fiber body, mycelium-grown acoustic chambers, fiber-optic strings. The most detailed instrument concept in the collection.

item.details: High-resolution digital blueprint (4096x2304) with full technical annotations. Edition 1 of 10.

title: 1:1 AI Architecture Deep Dive — 90 Minutes
description: Personal session with Frank covering your AI architecture challenges. Multi-agent design, MCP integration, production deployment, or custom ACOS setup. Recorded for your reference.

item.details: 90-minute video call. Agenda tailored to your needs. Includes recording and follow-up action plan document. Schedule within 30 days of purchase.

title: Custom ACOS Setup — Built For You
description: Frank builds a custom ACOS configuration for your workflow. Includes skill selection, agent routing, hook automation, and status bar — all tailored to your projects and tools.

item.details: Complete custom ACOS setup delivered as a .claude/ directory you drop into your project. Includes 2 revision rounds and documentation.

title: Future Music Laboratory — Edition #1/10
description: Wide establishing shot of a future music laboratory. Bio-tech grand piano as centerpiece, walls of living acoustic panels, holographic sheet music, crystal stalactite ceiling for natural reverb.

item.details: High-resolution panoramic print (4096x2304). The crown jewel of the Bio-Tech Instruments collection. Edition 1 of 10.
